channel.title: Help with dupe in trade
channel.description: ok i got a problem with my trade i added antidupe to it but u can still dupe so um when u trade the person put up ags and hit accept first time the then hit declien second time the person dcs and i get the weapon but he declined it so and he has it to how do i fix this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2009, 08:41:17 pm[/size][hr]does anybody got a good trade system that doesnt allow dupe at all
